languages.text: "Так точно", {n}— высокий мужчина почтительно склоняет голову.{/n} "Имею честь доложить, что к настоящему моменту все пожары на всех палубах устранены. Предварительная оценка ущерба — как в материалах, так и в человекоресурсах — завершена. Результаты переданы сенешалю и Высокому фактотуму".

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."
languages.original_text: "Так точно", {n}— высокий мужчина почтительно склоняет голову.{/n} "Имею честь доложить, что к настоящему моменту все пожары на всех палубах устранены. Предварительная оценка ущерба — как в материалах, так и в человекоресурсах — завершена. Результаты переданы сенешалю и Высокому фактотуму".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall young man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall young man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall young man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall young man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

"Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人！”{n}这位身材高大的男子向你低头致意。{/n}“目前所有甲板上的火灾都已经扑灭了，资源损失与船员伤亡的初步损失评估也已经完成。评估结果已经提交给了总领与高阶顾问。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人！”{n}这位身材高大的男子向你低头致意。{/n}“目前所有甲板上的火灾都已经扑灭了，资源损失与船员伤亡的初步损失评估也已经完成。评估结果已经提交给了总领与高阶顾问。”

languages.text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}背の高い男が頭を下げる。{/n}「全デッキの火災は鎮火しました。物的損失と乗組員の死傷という点で、予備的な損害査定が完了しました。その結果は、家令長とハイ・ファクトタムに提出済みです」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン！」{n}背の高い男が頭を下げる。{/n}「全デッキの火災は鎮火しました。物的損失と乗組員の死傷という点で、予備的な損害査定が完了しました。その結果は、家令長とハイ・ファクトタムに提出済みです」

languages.text: "Ja, Lord Captain!" {n}Der große Mann senkt ehrerbietig den Kopf.{/n} "Ich kann berichten, dass alle Brände auf sämtlichen Decks mittlerweile gelöscht sind. Meine erste Schadenseinschätzung – Material- und Crewverluste – ist abgeschlossen. Die Ergebnisse wurden dem Truchsess und dem Hoch-Faktotum übergeben."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Lord Captain!" {n}Der große Mann senkt ehrerbietig den Kopf.{/n} "Ich kann berichten, dass alle Brände auf sämtlichen Decks mittlerweile gelöscht sind. Meine erste Schadenseinschätzung – Material- und Crewverluste – ist abgeschlossen. Die Ergebnisse wurden dem Truchsess und dem Hoch-Faktotum übergeben."

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}L'homme élancé incline la tête en signe de déférence.{/n} « Je peux vous confirmer que tous les feux sur l'ensemble des ponts ont été maîtrisés. L'évaluation préliminaire de dégâts en termes de pertes matérielles et humaines est terminée. Les résultats ont été transmis au sénéchal et au haut factotum. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}L‘homme élancé incline la tête en signe de déférence.{/n} « Je peux vous confirmer que tous les feux sur l'ensemble des ponts ont été maîtrisés. L'évaluation préliminaire de dégâts en termes de pertes matérielles et humaines est terminée. Les résultats ont été transmis au sénéchal et au haut factotum. »

languages.text: «¡Sí, Lord Capitán!». {n}El alto hombre inclina la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «Me complace informar de que todos los incendios en todas las cubiertas están apagados. Hemos completado la evaluación preliminar de los daños, tanto de pérdidas materiales como de personal. Los resultados están en posesión del Senescal y del Sumo Factótum».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, Lord Capitán!». {n}El alto hombre inclina la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «Me complace informar de que todos los incendios en todas las cubiertas están apagados. Hemos completado la evaluación preliminar de los daños, tanto de pérdidas materiales como de personal. Los resultados están en posesión del Senescal y del Sumo Factótum».

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan!" {n}Uzun boylu genç adam, hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Güvertelerin hepsinde yangınlar söndürüldü. Maddi kayıplar ve tayfa zayiatını içeren ön hasar tespiti raporu hazırlandı. Sonuçlar, Seneşal ve Arşıkâhya'ya ibraz edildi."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Lord Captain!" {n}The tall man bows his head in deference.{/n} "I can report that all fires across all decks have now been extinguished. The preliminary damage assessment — in terms of material losses and crew casualties — has been completed. The results have been submitted to the Seneschal and the High Factotum."

traits.locale_text: "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan!" {n}Uzun boylu genç adam, hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Güvertelerin hepsinde yangınlar söndürüldü. Maddi kayıplar ve tayfa zayiatını içeren ön hasar tespiti raporu hazırlandı. Sonuçlar, Seneşal ve Arşıkâhya'ya ibraz edildi."
